bug.author: damochiz
bug.summary: the notebook https://aka.ms/pl-style-trans has no MpiStep example.
bug.description:
This page shows "For an example of using MpiStep, see the notebook <denchmark-link:https://aka.ms/pl-style-trans>https://aka.ms/pl-style-trans</denchmark-link> " but the linked page doesn't look like an example of using MpiStep. Please fix the linked URL or page. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Document Details</denchmark-h>
⚠ Do not edit this section. It is required for docs.microsoft.com ➟ GitHub issue linking.
ID: 00db76ef-5f7c-4685-b4ee-535fa9f9016a Version Independent ID: 30d18264-1388-61d7-085e-ae49c0db7805 Content: azureml.pipeline.steps.mpi_step.MpiStep class - Azure Machine Learning Python Content Source: AzureML-Docset/stable/docs-ref-autogen/azureml-pipeline-steps/azureml.pipeline.steps.mpi_step.MpiStep.yml Service: machine-learning Sub-service: core GitHub Login: @j-martens Microsoft Alias: jmartens

comments.comment: Thanks for the feedback! I have assigned the issue to the content author to investigate further and update the document as appropriate.
